## Methodology Overview
The manuscript describes a general methodology for the development of an adaptive stochastic gradient algorithm, Adam, which is used in deep learning and other machine learning applications. The authors provide a detailed description of the methodological approach used to develop this algorithm with references to the relevant literature. This is followed by an assessment of the research design and approach, strengths, weaknesses, and recommendations for improvement.
